attributes.action: Re-Nationalize our Utilities so that people will no longer be exploited by the profiteers of Industry and commerce.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the years we have seen our bills going up and up because of the Utility Companies making large profits out of the basic needs of everyone who drinks,eats,washes,needs heating and lighting and uses the basic amenities of life.It is scandalous that our very lives are being controlled and dictated by profiteers and vested interests.
All home users should be free from all but the most basic of charges, (if indeed charges at all,) because who can exist without water?If, by example, you don't have water, you die and so by denying us water or the ability to have enough water that will sustain our lives for free you could condemm us to death.Is that what you want?
